Key Match Events: LeBron James and Anthony Davis combined for 63 points, 23 rebounds, and 12 assists to lead the Lakers to a 131-127 victory.
Domantas Sabonis had a triple-double with 29 points, 12 rebounds, and 10 assists.
DeMar DeRozan and De'Aaron Fox combined for 51 points, 13 assists, and 5 rebounds.
The Lakers went on a 21-0 run in the fourth quarter to turn a seven-point deficit into a 108-94 advantage.
Anthony Davis' free throws in the last 10.1 seconds secured the Lakers' win.
